name: THE Leper Espoused
description:
Mother of the Tyrant of the Highest, THE Leper Espoused is the patron saint of all things vile and unsightly. Those who pray to her are the unseen and unclean, those infested with all forms of rot and blight, as well as the infectious. Once her grace pollute your soul there is no cure.

Print Purchase: COMING SOON!

THE Leper Espoused is an independent production by Astrolich and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the Mörk Borg Third Party License.
